column5: Well Percher was kind enough to let me come along this morning for a day of salmon, and Bow fishing in the lake. We met up at about 7am and were launched shortly after... after a while out there trolling we see one of the rods bounce and get released from the rigger... Fish On! and sure enough it was my first Salmon.  Not huge, but very fresh and healthy..., and great to have finially gotten one.   some more time passed and the same thing happens, and the rod is released, Yet another FISH ON... this was to be my first bow this fall and after a couple nice leaps in the air we got it boated for a quick pic, and then back into the drink it went... this one had a lamprey on the side as you can tell from the mark in the flesh.    It was a great day on the water, not a cloud to be seen and comfortable water conditions, and air temperatures all morning long. Again thanks Percher for gettin' me on those fish and my first salmon.
Nice looking fish there Bill.Thanx for the report and pics. Joe
Great report and pics!  Good on percher to take you out there as well.  Glad to see some fish were caught...and hopefully you learned a trick or two as well.
yup, i sure did learn a bunch about fishing for them salmons and bows today...
Nice fish bill !!!!!! gotta love lake Ontario...cheers
good job on getting a couple,congrats
Bill it was a pleasure having you out today.I was really hoping to get you hooked up with a few reel burners.Maybe next time.Great day great company .Thanks Dan
Ok I missed this one .Nice of you to take Bill out Dan.Congrats on your first salmon Bill.You look happy Billy  Where is the pics of Percher.Oh and you do better than Peter(Biteme)  MTP
Percher is A1 congrats Bill  And Mikey anytime you want to smell my fingers let me know I might even send you some fish scales if your a good boy
Congrats on your first Bill    Sounds like a nice day with some good company!
Congrat on your first!  Good on percher for helping ya out  Whopper
Great job there Bill ................and Dan awfully nice of you to take the young lad out for a fish.  Regards, Sam
Congrats Bill and nice salmon.  Don't ya just love saying "Fish On"!!
Congrats on the salmon and a nice lookin' bow except for the bullet wound! -Brian
